explanation: [0-0] A little girl and a little boy are sitting on chairs in the living room. The girl is wearing a mint green T-shirt and black pants, covering her mouth with her right hand. The boy is wearing a gray long-sleeve shirt and blue jeans, holding a cotton candy stick. Behind them is a sofa, and on the white wall, there is an air conditioner and some decorations.

[0-5] The boy licks the candy in his hand, and the girl lowers her right hand and turns to the left, pretending to bite her brother's cheek. She then turns back, chewing, while the boy, scared, shrinks his neck and looks at the girl, covering his face with his right hand and opening his mouth wide.
